resources.string: If you are experiencing any problems, click here to restart service.
Use your smartwatch to control the music on your smartphone, without a need to take the device out of your pocket.
This application is designed to work *only* with Poweramp Music Player.
A valid installation of Poweramp has been detected on your device.
It seems like it is not installed on your device. Click on a big icon above to get it from Google Play Store.
Just launch Poweramp Wear Controller on your smartwatch and that\'s it!
Poweramp Music Player is not installed - you can get it on Google Play.
There\'s no point in restarting service, since Poweramp is not installed
You are almost ready to go. Just give your devices a few minutes until wearable version of application will be installed on your smartwatch.
Poweramp Music Player won\'t refresh album art, while device is locked. When enabled, the screen will turn on for a while when changing tracks, just to refresh album art.
